Sentencas: Scandia doped zirconia (ScSZ) is a promising electrolyte candidate for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Effects of Sc doping on phase stability of Zr1 - xScxO2 and phase transition mechanism: First-principles calculations and Rietveld refinement

Sentencas: However, the cubic-tetragonal phase transition of ScSZ is a serious problem that blocks its extensive application.
Titulo: Effects of Sc doping on phase stability of Zr1 - xScxO2 and phase transition mechanism: First-principles calculations and Rietveld refinement

Sentencas: A systematic study of tetragonal and cubic phase stability of Zr-1 - xScxO2 as a function of x is carried out using density functional theory (DFT) calculations.
Titulo: Effects of Sc doping on phase stability of Zr1 - xScxO2 and phase transition mechanism: First-principles calculations and Rietveld refinement

Sentencas: The optimized atomic structures and total energies are obtained.
Titulo: Effects of Sc doping on phase stability of Zr1 - xScxO2 and phase transition mechanism: First-principles calculations and Rietveld refinement

Sentencas: The cubic phase becomes stable when x > 0.18.
Titulo: Effects of Sc doping on phase stability of Zr1 - xScxO2 and phase transition mechanism: First-principles calculations and Rietveld refinement

Sentencas: The largest tetragonal and cubic phase's total energy difference appears at x = 0.2188, which indicates that the cubic phase is most stable at this doping level.
Titulo: Effects of Sc doping on phase stability of Zr1 - xScxO2 and phase transition mechanism: First-principles calculations and Rietveld refinement

Sentencas: Furthermore, experiments have been carried out to verify the calculation reliability.
Titulo: Effects of Sc doping on phase stability of Zr1 - xScxO2 and phase transition mechanism: First-principles calculations and Rietveld refinement

Sentencas: The calculation results match well with our Rietveld refinement and Raman scattering observations.
Titulo: Effects of Sc doping on phase stability of Zr1 - xScxO2 and phase transition mechanism: First-principles calculations and Rietveld refinement

Sentencas: The relative phase transition mechanism has been analyzed systematically according to the calculated results and optimized atomic configuration.
Titulo: Effects of Sc doping on phase stability of Zr1 - xScxO2 and phase transition mechanism: First-principles calculations and Rietveld refinement

Sentencas: The phase structure transformation is shown to be closely correlated with cell volume difference, coordinated situation and oxygen displacement.
Titulo: Effects of Sc doping on phase stability of Zr1 - xScxO2 and phase transition mechanism: First-principles calculations and Rietveld refinement
